"Souya": "In a protracted war scenario, supply replenishment, as well as how those supplies are managed, is more important than anything else."
"The Supply Corps doesn't stand out as much as the other branches, but it's a job I take pride in."
"Behind the scenes, I'll be supporting my comrades--including you--every step of the way."
"The name's Souya. I'm with the Stia Vanguard's Supply Corps."
"Actually, I was wondering if you could give me a hand."
"\"Invisible Boxes\" were reportedly encountered in Dreisen Plant."
"You should be able to use your Mag's Active Sonar to track their location. Good luck out there."
"Ah, you're busy right now? Alright, just let me know when you can lend an extra hand."
